course_title: Special Topics in Biblical Interpretation: The Earth Bible
class_notes: (TOPIC: The Earth Bible: Journeys with Mother Earth) (ON CAMPUS) (Meets weekdays 9:00am-3:00pm during May Term) (The course explores biblical perspectives of the Earth and the scholarly interpretations within the contemporary context of climate change and global warming. It investigates biblical frameworks, ideologies, theologies and characterization of the Earth and creation.  It explores the intersection of ecology with gender, class, race and empire in biblical texts, while seeking to note and develop liberating perspectives propounded within the texts.  The course will sample from the main biblical genres as well as utilize poems, songs, and videos to highlight contemporary climate change.)
